title: Auto Hard Pause with saved number issue
content:
I have an issue when using a saved meeting number that had an auto Hard Pause followed by the meeting code.
I have it formatted as XXX-XXX-XXXX;XXXXXXX#
This never dials correctly.
However if I use the saved number without the meeting code XXX-XXX-XXXX then manually add the wait followed by the meeting code it works.
attached are screenshots showing the saved number and results of the call.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
